data.text: @theAliceRoberts So sorry. Wishing for a speedy recovery x
@EssenceSatoshi @ade___p @theAliceRoberts Thatâ€™s not what Ade said. Can you read?
@DanPaulman @theAliceRoberts Alice has asthma in her family.

@AcelaThe @guthers102 @andyblueskyz @theAliceRoberts Every winter of every decade in living memory the 'NHS is on the Brink of collapse' writ large on every newspaper. It happened in 2020 and 2021 as well. Seasonal respiratory diseases kill millions of humans, they always have and they always will.

@HenryB12345 @theAliceRoberts Henry Shhh. Enough of you and your politically inconvenient truths. 
Widen eyes, let them swirl hypnotically and repeat after me: "covid is very dangerous for children, only mass vaccination will stop dozens dying"

@mediavets @andyfletcher @theAliceRoberts So if an person has had maybe 15 different vaccines so far in life, but one comes along they decide they won't have for whatever reason, are they, in your book, no longer 'pro-vax'? How does it work? You must take every single one ever made or you are by default an antivaxxer?

@Bobbadbig @bombaypotato @Glitterbabe03 @theAliceRoberts You don't know her child's medical history or if this is will be serious for her kid. There are still 14000 children dead from covid and it's just insensitive to say they where just unlucky. Kinda makes it sounds like you think that it's fine they died.
